title: People not trying in ranked
body:
So this is basically going to be a rant, keep that in mid.

So i decided i would queue up for ranked today, mid and jungle as i have been, now i went through about 10 champion selects because people don't understand the lock in mechanic (i don't understand how) and ended up spending about 40 minutes waiting for a game, while not being able to afk at all because of the lock in mechanic.

And then get into the game, not only did we have a dc for a few minutes but we had Lucian that decided he wasn't going to try because of whatever reason.

Why the fuck would you go into queue, put up with 40 minutes of queues, to not fucking try?

replies.body:
This season ranked is legit stupid people sit in queue for hours you find a match then someone doesn't lock in. Then if you even get into a lobby people just swap roles with them self even tho the  new queue up system. You lose to a group of people then after wards you vs them again i remember in season 3 ranked was serious these days if you want a game where people aren't yelling at you. And reporting you for asking for a gank Go play normals. the new banning system is to much power for the oce sever riot you giving summoners a easier way to troll team mates. Oh my adc wants to play vayne so ill just ban vayne oh jg wants olaf ban olaf. Ranked used to be fun now its full of trolls. you ask for ganks u get reported you have one bad game and everyone smack talks you all game 
 
You get a troll on your team taric mid 1/10 crit items so your team reports him and nothing happens then you get one report for verbal abuse after asking for a gank and you get chat bans 

#riotfixoce

I've done 2 hours in queue today for one game, 70 minutes yesterday, and 120 minutes with only one game the day before (gave up for a second game.)

Ranked really isn't worth it for me as there is no way to go afk while waiting.
He most likely was trying but did bad and used it as an excuse.
